content.detailedDescription:
We were on our second night in halifax nova scotia, sitting on our condo balcony in lower water street, looking south at the sky between the buildings.  we thought perhaps we were seeing some kind of fireworks or light display, when we saw the blue-green glowing light in the sky, but then noticed it did not move.  then it pulsed slightly and seemed to drip down upon itself almost like a lava lamp, and then broke into three even sections before our eyes. it stayed in the exact same spot, however, and came back together several times, continuing to glow with an odd greenish blue light for ten full minutes.  

at the end of the event, it formed a ball of bluish green colored light and bounced up and down and all around very irratically. eventually, it grew smaller in size and dimmer in appearance until it was gone altogether.  my husband and i are sceptical and would like to know what it was that we saw, if there is in fact an earlthy explanation. 

we did not feel scared but felt amazed and awed by the object. it was also very beautiful because its light was glowing and looked very unearthly.  we knew it was not a plane or helicopter and since it seemed not to be affected by the intermittent clouds (or lack there of) it was hard to imagine it was any kind of projection from below -- like a prank. to project something, one needs a screen of clouds or another surface to use and there was no consistent cloud cover that night. we could easily see stars around the object but it was too elongated / bar shaped to be any kind of planet or star.  since it was not moving and only seemed to pulsate and divide, it is hard to imagine it was any kind of human made craft.
content.summary: Blue green laser-like, vertical cigar shaped stationary object in sky.

content.detailedDescription: The year was 1973,my friend and i had decided to go to the skyline drivein theater near wooster ohio to see a couple of movies. it was mid october and the skys were clear cool and stary. i can say that i can't remember the movies that were shown,but i do remember the event of the evening. as we sat in the car i had noticed a bright dot about the size of a pencil eraser at about ten feet distance. the dot hung above the skyline of the city of wooster. the dot tumbled top to bottom as if it were a ball rolling on the ground, as it rolled it changed colors of red,yellow,orange and a whitish blue.The color flashes reminds me of the crystals you see hanging on a automobiles rearview mirror that you see now. i would say that the dot looked to be approximately 1500 feet in the air. from my vantage point it was to the right of the screen as the screen faced the west south west. i continued to watch the movie,then i saw a flash in the sky which drew my attention,it was the ufo,and it was moving in a southward direction. i trained my eyes and watched it move across the sky and knew that it would soon be out of my sight line as the movie screen would block my view of it. i continued to look at the top and left of the screen to see if it would show up,and after a few minutes it did. the ufo stopped to the left of the movie screen at about the same distance and height as my first sighting,and it continued to do it's colorful tumbling motion. i never spoke to my friend of all this as they weren't a believer in such things and i always had a open  mind. i was able to see the movie and the ufo as they both were in the same field of view. then the ufo flashed in the sky and it again started to move toward the east doing it's colorful tumbling during it's travel.I fixed my eyes on it and decided to focus only on it. i rolled the driverside window down to see if i could hear if it made any sound. all i could hear was the speakers of the theater in the drivein. i thought now i know an airplane can not make these actions and it would be pretty late for helicopter traffic, not to mention the colorful tumbleing light it had.I eventually had to pivot my body to the left to see the ufo as it had traveled farther than my head could turn. my friend said what in the $&## are you looking at? i said this light in the sky,and my friend said whatever!! i rolled up the window and thought to watch the movie to keep the peace.So i turned around to face the screen and started to watch the movie again. i turned my body around for a moment to see if the ufo was still there and the it was gone,only the stars remained.
content.summary: Saw a star like dot that tumbled and changed colors continuously when stationary and while traveling.

content.detailedDescription: On august 29 2010 around 5pm i was outside with my family and i spotted what looked like a star in the sky and i pointed it out to my daughter, we both seen it. when we pointed  it out to the rest of the family it shot off and disappeared. then on august 30, 2010 i woke up at about 4 am and could see out the window that there were 6 star like objects but were moving very slowly and pulsating. they were gone by 4:50 am.
content.summary: Starlike ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out walking my dog.  the object was view when i felt the need to look upwards to the skies above, then, by chance, i saw an object moving south to north, very fast, at what i thought to be a low altitude. my street, 13th place, is on the western side of norfolk. it was visable for only a short time, maybe 20 to 25 seconds. this wasn't the first time i have viewed ufos, just the most recent and i was excited about this. i lost sight of the object when it went behind high tree branches.  

i have known [name moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg] a long time, he is a mufon member, i immediatly visited at his home to report the sighting.
content.summary: Fast traveling disc shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
My 6 year old daughter woke up at approx 3am, saying there were aliens out side, i sorta brushed her off, but had her describe them, thinking they were just stars or something. she said they were in the field next to us. i just told her it was fine, and go back to bed, and that i would check it out. (what every dad has to do right). so after a bit i went out side to check it out. i didn't really see anything other than jupiter brighter than i'd ever seen before. but that was on the other side of the house, she couldn't have seen that. the only thing interesting was what i thought was mars, about the right size flashing red. i went back inside. she was standing in the living room waiting for me. "daddy the aliens still out there" i asked while i was out there. she said yes. now i knew for sure she had to just be seeing things. i had her draw me a picture. she drew the dome first, i thought she was going to draw a cigar type but then but a disk on the bottom. i've never heard of anything like that, maybe you have. i drew another and asked if that was it. the pic is not scanned or i would send it now. this happened less that 2 hours ago. again i had her go back to bed, and told her it was fine and it would be ok. about 4:00am i checked on her, she was still awake. i had her point to where she saw this. she did and said there still out there. now i'm getting freaked. what the heck is she seeing? i had her get up and told her were going outside. she didn't seem to want to, the whole time she was acting scared, which is very unlike her. as soon as we got out, she yelled there right there, all over the place, i'm like what are you seeing. "they are small now, by the stars." i said you are just seeing stars. she said, no these ones are moving all over. i thought satellites.
then she pointed out what i thought was mars. "see it flashing and it's moving. i had moved quite a bit in the half hour or so sense i had been out there. i had moved from one side of the tree to the other in a half hour? i had the moon and jupiter as reference, they hadn't moved that much. and it was flashing, not like a plane or like a twinkle. the white always on behind the red flash. this all was to the east. i had asked her, she said that it had been close to the house and was much larger. and didn't know if what we were seeing was the one she saw close. about there being lost of them, i am understanding she thinks that all the other ones were above and could all have been on a bigger vessel, all she said about them was that they flashed. the lights on the smaller craft she said were almost of every color. red green yellow etc. and something about green and yellow at the same time. and said the dome was a yellowish green. i put her back to bed and googled this site. it's 5:20am and i'm going for another look. then i'll report. 5:27 and i'm already back and i'm spooked. i went out, was looking around and noticed the moon and jupiter had moved. and as i looked at jupiter i noticed there was 2 of them. i thought where did that star come from? i didn't see it earlier. it was just as bright, and if you have seen jupiter like this you know what i meen, you notice it. now 2 of them? just as i thought that. the one that was not jupiter began moving to the south and in about 10 seconds was gone. from the time i noticed it until the time it began to move was between 5 and ten seconds. like it moved because i noticed it. this was bright white, almost a twin in every way to jupiter. you know that feeling, like your being watched? that's how i feel right now. i'm still curious but nervous at the same time. that's how my daughter felt. if i had a sixth sense i'd say these things are up to no good, it's just my feeling. for perspective i'm a christian and don't drink. i believe that this is possible. 1. because i've seen a metallic orb during the day before, and know for a fact what i saw and i've never seen humans create anything close to that. it was literally a ball of liquid mercury stationary in the sky for more than 15 min. i think that was 1998. anyway if anything else happens, i'll write it down and get back with you, feel free to email me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Tall dome on top of disk, with flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I���m a real state broker in argentina and that morning i was taking several pictures of that building and particular an apartment. 
the next day i showed this picture to a costumer and he says that it was an ufo. 
i don���t know much but it seems real. you decide
saludos to gringolandia
*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Just a picture gringos.

content.detailedDescription:
A few weeks ago my mother and brother were heading over to a friend of the family's house when they noticed these three really bright lights hovering really low by the tree line.  upon the time of getting to a clearing the object came across an open field.  my mother said that she pulled the car over so that my brother can get a picture with the camera.  as my brother went to go take the photograph, the object in the sky disappeared.  seconds later after the object vanished, two fighter jets flew over head as either being in pursuit or escorting the object.  

since about april of this year, i myself have noticed stranger objects in the night time sky.  i noticed on three separate occasions of seeing a solid glowing white to blue color object in the sky moving like a plane but moving away from my line of vision.  being a lover of astronomy, i know what planes, satellites and meteors look like in the night sky.  when a plane is  coming toward your line of vision you see a solid white light until it gets closer you can start seeing the red and blue flashing lights.  when the planes move away, you then just see the blinking red and blue lights until it fades off in the distance.  

the objects i have seen kept a bright solid glow to them even after moving away from my line of vision.  there were no blinking red or blue lights, just a solid whitish blue object moving ever so quietly. i know it was not a meteor or satellite or a government issue weather balloon.  i have been keeping an eye on the skies at night and hope that i can capture these objects in a photo or on a camera soon.  i will keep you posted. also, if whoever contacts me through this site, please give me an update if there are any sightings in my area so that i can help look into it.  thanks
content.summary: Numerous sightings since april of 2010 with one happening two weeks ago.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying down on the sidewalk behind a restaurant looking into the sky when a white orb came zooming overhead superfast.  it made a humming sound or a crackling sound -- hard to describe noise.
content.summary: White sphere baseball size shot across sky south to north.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on colwood rd. (also known as bay port rd.) in huron county, near bach, michigan.
time was just before 10:00pm when i noticed first light straight ahead on my direction.

the light appeared fairly bright, definitely noticeable, and of a white color, and was just west of the road.  it was there for a moment and was gone.  it was just below the window seal of the front window, and was not at eye level or at the horizon.  my guess would be ~20 degrees off the horizon.  first thought was it was a small plane, i.E. cessna, making a night landing, and what i saw was the lights as the plane turned about.

shortly later i saw the same type of light just east of the road, and its behavior was the same.

shortly after this, i saw a series of 4-5 lights appear, starting just east of the road, and appearing in series westward.  these were also fairly bright and of a white color.  they were visible for a moment, and not long enough it see any motion to determine if they were falling, drifting, etc..

the series if 4-5 lights appeared 3 times, each time they appear to start closer to the road, and the 3rd ended just over or just west of the road.

while driving, during the 2nd series, i believed two of the lights appear to come close to each other, but my vision was obscured by the trees in the area.

it was during the 3rd series that i decided to pull to the side of the road to better observe, and attempt to hear any aircraft.  i heard no aircraft while the window was down.  i had previously turned my phone off as my reception was having problems, and turned it on in hopes of getting either images or movies of the event, but it never appeared again.

the entire event may have been a few minutes.  the time when i was observing the series of lights and decided to pull to the side was 10:00pm.  i recall seeing the big dipper in the sky, just west of the road.  all the lights had appeared pretty much appeared due north.

it is possible that the event was a military training exercise, selfridge ang base is less then 80 miles away, and i did observe military jets further north the next day in the afternoon.  this was near caseville, michigan and would be 15 miles north of where i saw the lights.  however i never seen flares on and off as quick as these.  the lights were visible for a moment or two, but were not visible for any significant length of time, and did not appear to fade out, but simply disappeared.
content.summary: Several bright lights, appearing in series and disappearing in series.

content.detailedDescription:
My financee and i were in the courtyard of st. michael's cathedral in kiev. the skies were completely clear, the moon off to our right.Sitting on a bench in relative quiet, i first observed the rose/gold orb off to my left (west). at first, i thought it was a searchlight on a helicopter,though i'd never seen that color searchlight. i thought, well, i'm in ukraine, and maybe this color isn't unusual here. however, when i looked back at it some 2-3 minutes later, it had not moved. 

i pointed it out to my finacee, a ukrainian, and asked her if she knew what it was ... do helicopters in ukraine have lights that color. she said she'd never seen a searchlight on a helicopter, to the best of her knowledge, and that she didn't know what it was. we began to watch it while talking, and it began to move to the east. it did not move in an arc. it's motion was erratic, going one way a bit, stopping, another way, backtracking, no coherent direction to its movement. i still thought it might be a helicopter, though the movement seemed odd even for a helicopter.

however, in a general sense, it was moving from our left to our right, and as it did it was growing in size. when it was about 30 degrees to our left, crazy as it sounds i got a "message" from it. it was my second day in kiev, and the message was, essentially, "hi, welcome .... when "i" get about 30 degrees to your right, "i" will disappear." it felt "friendly."

i told my finacee that i'd just received a message from the orb, explaining what i'd heard. she smiled, with a bemused look on her face. as this orb traveled to be directly in front of us, i was astounded by its size, about a penny's width held at arm's length. a rock musician when i was younger, my hearing is not the sharpest. given the time, traffic was extremely sparse, the noise from it barely audible.

i asked my finacee, do you hear anything. after a few seconds, she said no. nothing at all, i asked. she listened again. no, nothing, she said. i said, by definition, we are seeing a ufo. it's unidentified, flying, and a rather large object. i noted, everything man-made which flies makes some noise. she agreed, and the former look of bemusement no longer was on her face.

i repeated to her: it's going to disappear when it gets "about there," pointing about 30 degrees to our right. it continued moving, and oddly, it's size remained the same. when it flew to about 30 degrees to our right, on cue it disappeared. never will i forget the look on my fiancee's face. though we were startled, both of us had a peaceful feeling. nothing about it seemed threatening or ominous at any time.

though i've observed other ufos in my life, this one was unique. it did not travel in any kind of straight line. the color, i'd never seen a ufo that color. the size, this was the largest orb i've ever seen, by far. and of course, the "message," and the orb disappearing just as it had promised me.

i am very glad i had a witness to this event, so unusual it was.
content.summary: A big, bright, rose/gold orb observed, no sound whatsoever, large orb about the size of a penny at arm's length.

content.detailedDescription: My wife,myself and two friends had just finished playing a couple of hands of cards when we all decided that we have had enough fun for the day. the two ladies went to the deck of the cottage where we were stayng to smoke a cigratte. after a few minutes on the deck my wife called to me and wanted me to observe something unusual in the low sky. she pointed it out to me and said "look at this thing it has strange colors". she pointed it out to me and the first thing that was obvious to me was that it was emmiting more than one color. my friends had binoculars so it was the first thing i tried to get to. once i focused on the object it appeared to me to be a pulsating object with the colors of red, white and green continuously at a rate of about 2-3 tenths of a second. when the light was white it looked to be triangular in shape. when they brought out their telescope to see if we could aquire a better visual description of the object it took a few moments to capture the object in the lense. my first look at it appeared to be the same as the binoculars had rendered. we continued to watch the object for an addition 15 miutes.  movement was minimal. maybe 30 degrees west to east, with continual  lights flashing.  total length of observation was approx 45 minutes.  we were at the south end of elk lake.  we then retired for the evening.
content.summary: Saw flashing object  approx 15 degrees above hoizon.

content.detailedDescription:
"what i see looks almost like a frisbee," she said. "you see a several lights going around, and they're all symmetrical and lit up, and it just looks like an object in the sky."

"b-p" is hesitant to call the string of lights in the sky ufos, although she can't identify the flying objects.

"we've seen falling stars, all kinds of stuff out there because you're away form the city," she said. "anytime there's a meteor shower or anything, you can see it a lot better, but i've never seen anything like that."

"b-p" said the pictures were taken by a single motion-activated game camera. the equipment wasn't moved, and it doesn't have a flash. instead, it uses infrared. she said she has ruled out light posts or cell phone towers because the area is pretty empty.

"there's nothing back there but trees and sky," she said. "there's no hills, no buildings, nothing back there. it's all flat."

timestamps on several pictures also show that the object hovered in the air for almost two hours.
whatever it is, she is now a little hesitant to go out to her deer blind alone.

"it's creepy," "b-p" said. "i don't know if i want to be sitting out in my deer stand by my self anymore, hunting."

archer city, which is just south of wichita falls, is also close to sheppard air force base. the installation did not immediately return requests asking if it had planes up the night the pictures were taken.
content.summary: Disc shape object.

content.detailedDescription: This siteing was in the fall of 1959, on a clear sunny day in the fall. i was six years old at the time and lived in a house on paradise road near the south western part of orrville,ohio. i was playing in the living room and decided to go to my bedroom for more toys. once i got to the bedroom i felt compelled to look out the window, which faced the east. i couldn't believe what i saw,there were a dozen or more cylinder/blimp type objects in the south eastern sky. they looked to be just hanging there in the sky just as if they were painted without movement. i would estimate that they were all the size of a hotdog twenty feet away. i could see them clearly as our home was one of four on the street and a huge freshly cut corn field was behind our home. they were just above a black railroad tressel which was between one half to three quarter of a mile away. i ran to the kitchen to get my mom in here to see them. i tugged at my mothers arm and said there are blimps or balloons are in the sky, you gotta come see. she said your "imagineing things go play"! i looked at her and could see the wall clock was just before the three o'clock hour,i said come and look,and she came to my room and i said look,and she said where,i said right there as i looked out the window to the empty sky. she said,"go play" now i never had much of a person to make up things and here i am in a position where it looks as if i'm creating a fib. i did go onto play with my toys afterward,but i still hate the thought that i may have been the only one to see this site.
content.summary: A dozen or more blimp/cylinder objects hanging in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Myself, father and daughter where sitting on outside deck when my father noticed an object in the sky. i turned to look and as i did i saw 1 then 3 then a whole line of objects, actually 2 lines not in formation moving very slowly from west to east approximately 1/2 mile from our house they were small so they must have been high in the sky. i thought that they were flares, but they never descended they just kept moving to the east. they moved slow enough for me to call my wife who also came out and saw them. they were'nt in a perfect line, they were staggered. i tried to take a pic with my cell but it didn't come out. the objects then disappeared behind a tree line. we recently moved in to house and couldn't find camera.  my dad called town police who came out to the house and i told them exactly what i saw. they said that there were other reports of the same things and that they were leaving my house to investigate at another.
content.summary: 11-13 orange/red objects appeared in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok so... i was watching the airplanes in the sky tonight between 9 and 10. then i saw a bright star about half the size of the moon. it was sitting in the sky at low altitude kind of (20 degrees above horizon), not moving, just white color. for about 2-3 min. then it started moving slow, then it moved higher and started flying fast, faster then airplanes, and  i saw green red and white lights flickering, like some christmas tree. i can't tell what the shape was, but it was really big and got bigger when it was flying... there were at least 10-15 lights all over, and sometimes it looked more like a triangle shape, sometimes like circle  i can't tell. it was too far. 
after that i kept watching the sky... was wondering if i'd see anything else. and after about 10 min i looked to the right from my window (3rd floor) and i saw a single bright ball fly by super fast on the low altitude staying on the same level but zigzaging a little bit. i absolutely freaked out because that was closer then i would like to see anything like that. i jumped away from the window and closed blinds. i don't think anybody is going to hurt me or take. but that was a mind shock because it was nothing like anything else i've seen with my eyes and it was very close. if anyone else saw it please let me know! i'd really like to talk to somebody about this.
content.summary: Bright light about half size of the moon stationary in the sky, then starts flying slow, then fast and changes colors.

content.detailedDescription: So when i had to get my things for a night at a friends house i did what i normaly do. i looked around at the stars and tryed to find shooting stars. so i look and i look and i see a fireball shaped thing in the sky. i stopped and looked but then a car came by and i let it past. when i looked back at it it was replaced by at least ten more of the same thing. i got scared so i knowced on the door of the nearest house and an old man came out. i asked him what was in the sky and he didnt know what it was either. we looked at it and then they all just disappered from no where and that was that. i thought maybe it was some one sending out good wishes for the dead but then i see two humvees drive by me and a helichopper fly over in the direction of where the fireball things in the sky dissapered. i almost got hit so trust me when i said that there was no way i wouldnt have seen the design. well once i hit the town i live in i asked if anyone else saw them and they said nothing. i even asked about the military veichles and they just looked at me odd like i was crazy. so i got my belonggings for the night at my friends and when i got half way there i heard sounds. it was from a fenced off power station that has been abbandoded for a long while. there are lights and strange static sounds and when i was about to go look to see what it was i heard something in the buches and i just booked it. so thats about it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: It came from no where and left just as fast. i saw some sort of army personnel following it.

content.detailedDescription: I had just arrived home and was standing out in the darkness and my eyes adjusted to the night sky and the stars.  when i looked over to the one area of the sky, i noticed what appeared to be a star that was blinking continually from red with white, to teal with white.  it remained motionless.  i went to a nearby location for a better point for viewing it and after a while, it began to lose its intensity of blinking red or green.  also, with it being after 12:30a.M. i was becoming very tired, so i gave up on watching it any longer.  as far as my state of mind was at the point of seeing this object, i was wide awake and had not been under any influences of alcohol or drugs.
content.summary: Continually changing color of star-like size: red/teal/white while remaining stagnant.

content.detailedDescription: I looked onto the skies south southwest and saw a light hanging in the sky. their was no noise and object seemed to be floating then shot upwardon a curve real fast and stopped. it then started to very slow fall like a leaf or balloon going back and forth. then it stayed still in the same spot for about 3-5 minutes before it slowly glided left and then right with an gliding movement. this went on for about an hour before another dim light joined it from the south and they seemed to be chasing each other. then they would shoot up in a curve in the sky and drop fast and stop. they suddenly disappeared in southern sky and a dark colored helicopter with blinking white light traveled from east to west. i could hear the helicopter blades in the sky. it continued on its track heading west and then disappeared from my view. object appeared again at 11:24pm in the southern sky gliding left to right then hovering while no difference in the dimness of object. the moon and one star in the east are very bright tonight. there is no noise from the object floating or gliding through sky. lost sight of object at 11:30 pm in southern sky behind trees and horizon. didnt have camera to take photos of object and thought object was just a star when first sighted. it never changed color or brightness from dim white the whole time i spotted it. i caught it out the corner of my eye when i first saw it because of its erratic movements in sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dull white light dimmer than stars in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 10pm est, a starlike object dropped from the sky, then slowed to almost a stop and proceeded to move at a slow pace moving due east.
the object appeared from the north assuming over lake erie. about 10 min later another starlike object was travling from west to east. it then stopped...Matching the stars in the sky, then started moving due north, then faded into nothing.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 starlike objects appeared.

content.detailedDescription: You folks should send someone here.  there are unexplained lights in the sky every night.  my wife and i have recently moved here from georgia and we have never seen anything like this. these objects spew out lights of different colors continually, changing from red to green, blue, etc...  i have counted as many as 15 of these objects in the sky at the same time out here.
content.summary: Many objects in sky. all changing colors constantly.

content.detailedDescription: My brother, mother and i were swimming in june or july 2005 and it was mid afternoon. i am always looking up to see airplanes and i saw a black triangle that was flying backwards and it was silent and yelled over to my mom who then looked up and saw it she did not know what it was either. there were no lights of any kind it was pure black i cant stress how dark it was. and it looked like it had a ball in the center on bottom(tried to do it on paint but i could not get it to look right). we watched it for 5-10 minutes before it went behind the hill. it was not very high in the sky but higher than normal airplanes. we live in an area that has (i would call)moderate amount of air traffic 5-10 low airplanes daily, but this was flying way off the normal path, normal being northeast(to airport) and southwest (from airport) and this was going north west over the lake and nothing ever goes that way. i have not seen it sense or anything close to it. i included a pic of the path. i would have drawn it but i have no scanner so i used paint do sorry about the quality.
content.summary: Backward flying triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing last night (8/27/10) on lake fenton with my son.  it was between 11-12 pm  my son said "what is that?" i looked and it was a yellowish colored oval light with squiggly lines coming off it.  it was about 15' across, about 500 ft. up in the air.  no sound at all - it was moving north, blinked off for a split second then blinked again and the light went out.  it was not going very fast.  we both immediately knew it was not a plane or helicopter.  my first thought was i knew it was something that should not have been there. it happened very quickly, and we did not have time to get a picture.
last week, there was a stealth plane flying over dickenson lake in holly - another oddity for this area.
content.summary: It was shaped like an oval ball of yellowish colored light.

content.detailedDescription: It was too far and a short period of time to see them before my view was block by a super large tree in my backyard. the objects were moving w to se with one trailing behing the other. from a distace they appear to be identical judging by the size and the exact pace they were moving. i would dismiss it if there was a landing strip nearby but there is not. i just felt i should report it just incase someone else had a better view. i discribe it as a cigar cause the object was plane like but too far to see if it had wings.
content.summary: Could have simply been two planes.

content.detailedDescription: I was cooking dinner at around 8 pm i went out to the back deck to have a smoke.  i like to watch all the airplanes that fly over on there way to the airport and noticed a very bright star in the sky.  i soon realized it was moving towards me in a northen direction.  i noticed a plane on its way to land at the airport and how close the round ball of light was geeting to the plane.  i thought they were going to collide as they crossed paths almost directly over head.  there were no flashing lights or strobes as aircraft have and i did not hear any sound.   the object then made a 90 deg turn towards the east and i lost site of it over the mountian.  it did not seem to be moving very fast but sure was not like anything i have noticed before, my first thought was ufo.
content.summary: Bright ball shaped bright white light  moving towards the north no sound no strobes.

content.detailedDescription: this is the encounter my mother had back in 1979/1980 in st. claire shores mich at the playground/ballfield by talbot st.&new york st.It was 7:00pm maybe 8:00pm,august or sept,she was 45 yrs old &i was 10 yrs old or so,and my sister was 16yrs old.My mother just recalled this past incident about 4 or 5 months ago,and told my sister the story,who then informed me of it this past july.It began that evening,my mother took our dog rocky out for a walk,she is never gone more than hour or so,but that all changed during this walk.After an hour i began to worry,imust have told my sister because she clearly remembers me being alarmed.Here is the story my mother conveyed:while i was walking rocky across the park/ballfield i noticed odd lights all different colors flashing on the ground,i thought it was strange that utility workers would be working at this time in the late evening.Next i saw several who i thought were small children all around me.They did'nt look like normal kids though and then they began to talk to me,not through their mouths,but through their minds.I heard them clearly in my mind.The beings said why don't you come with us,and i said to where,and one of said to our craft right over there. i said no i'm busy why should i go with you,and they responded because we want to help you.Then another being asked me what is that next to you?Before i could answer one other being said thats her pet.Then one of them said again come with us we want to help you,i told them if you want to help me you should go to washington.What is washington?One of them said.After that exchange my mother says she remembers very little.A note to the reader,i had an encounter in my yard when i was 7 or 8 years of age.A craft was hovering over our front yard and i saw 3 beings staring down upon me from inside the craft,which was about 60 or 70 ft above me.Also my sister saw a ufo hovering near her while she was on her bike,she was 10 or 11 at the time,and it occured at talbot st and new york st also . our house is only 5 or 6 houses from new york st.Today the house is still there,but nobody resides there yet.By the way my childhood friend & his family always told me & others that our house was haunted,because they saw bluish glowing or bluish orbs over our rooftop more than once back in the late 70's.
content.summary: My mother was walking our dog in the park across from our house, and came upon a landed ufo along with several beings which then engaged in conversation with her.

content.detailedDescription: I wasn't sure what i saw so didn't think to report right away. but i saw a similar report in oregon which isn't far from me. so i will report mine and you can decide. i was watching an airplane on my way to the day care to pick daughter up, and then i saw a very bright light which was about 30 degrees above horizon in the distance that shot up to 45 or 50 degrees and then disappeared. the event lasted only 2-3 seconds but it was moving very fast. i couldn't not notice it, that's how bright it was. maybe the size of a tennis ball from where i was. and it couldn't be a meteorite because i've seen them before and they don't go up in the sky. maybe it was some rocket i don't know.
content.summary: Very bright light shoot up in the sky at 45 degrees from horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the blue jays game with my sister and my brother. a couple of minutes when the game began is saw a big sphere like circle shape thing my sister just said it was a star but the sun was still up and it was blue sky's.   
the ufo was near a building where no one could see so i looked  again and i saw nothing it was gone so i think what i saw was a ufo.
content.summary: Sphere like and looked like a circle.

content.detailedDescription:
We was at dillon lake hanging out looking at the star when we heard a hummm
it came down the lake from the north and went south. it was about 50 ft long maybe 20ft wide about 15-20 ft tall  it was hofering over the lake flashing some tape of beam into the water then it sounded like it was sucking up water when it left its made wining souds and flew off to west and disaperd at a high rate of speed not sure how fast it went

we was in the parking lot just looking the star talking get a telscope so we could use it when it happen. wasntreally scary but nevers but we had heard of it from other
content.summary: Its back what they call the tour  bus from 1988 and

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling from the cisco,tx countryside on back roads towards eastland,tx and a large round white light was following us most of the way, jigg-jagging from one side of the car to the other with no sound. our windows were all rolled down and the object was not far away but we heard nothing. we were a family of six with kids ranging from six to ten yrs of age all of whom were very excited and a little scared. this object followed us most of the way, then just darted away quickly. a few days later the object was hovering above our home for several hours while we were all outdoors having a cookout. we lived a few miles out in the country in a secluded area. i don't know if it's related, but also around about the same time of the month, our home started shaking or trembling sort of like an earthquake, although there were none reported in the area. this actually caused cracks in the mortar of our rock house. it's nice to finally get this off my mind my telling someone. thanks.
content.summary: Light chasing family car out in the country

content.detailedDescription:
last night we saw several ufo's over clovis, ca. they were some type of aircraft, moving very swiftly, with pulsating red lights that also flashed
to white.  my husband and i watched from our back yard, the same place as we did last night.  at 10:30 pm, we saw the first of 8 ufo craft in the northern sky over clovis.  this time they seemed much farther away.  they moved fast, were silent (unlike jets) and they went clockwise and counter clockwise from the n. sky until they were out of view. the craft were mostly single tonight and not in formations of 3. -- what we saw both yesterday and tonight was exactly like the man shot in the clovis video he did awhile back at 5am, where he showed an aircraft that had pulsating lights which moved across the sky about tree level.  what he shot was just like we saw last night and tonight!  the sightings tonight started at 10:05pm and ended at 11:20pm.-- we could not make out the shape of the craft, just the pulsating lights they had. --also, they were not lanterns sent up as a prank as one person recently suggested.  they did not move slowly with the wind currents, but moved fast, against the wind.  and the lights around them were bright,quivery,and pulsating, but not like the beacons that are on normal aircraft. we will look tomorrow night to see if there is any more activity. we don't have a video camera, but i wish someone else in clovis would look up into the northern sky tomorrow arount 10pm and see if they can't get some footage of this.
content.summary: Second sighting of red/white pulsating lighted aircraft over clovis, ca.
